name: Cardiac Unrest
description:
Cardiac Unrest is a single-player 3rd-person shooter game with survival horror elements. You're tasked with killing the spirit while warding away its darkness. Look for Prayer books inside the desks around the school to bring back the light. If the school lights turn off, locate the power room and flip the master switch.

Features:
-Explore an immersive nighttime school environment.
-Realistic weapon and weapon animations.
-Enemy AI meant for a tough challenge.
-Unique "type to heal" system.
-Ammo pickup system for finding more ammo around the map.
-Outdoor environment section in the center of the school.
-hidden letters meant for lore.
-Gun flashlight because environment gets very dark over time.
-Gun can be shot by aiming or by hip-firing.
